intro: Climb higher, survive longer, reach the summit.
description:
Alone in the wilderness, your only path is up. After a devastating crash, you awaken at the base of a towering mountain—the last chance for survival. The climb is relentless: thin air, sheer cliffs, and merciless weather stand in your way. Hunger and exhaustion gnaw at your strength as the wild terrain pushes you to the edge. Every ledge tests your courage, every storm your determination. Reaching the summit is your only hope—but it will demand everything you have.

Key Features:
 • The Ultimate Climb – Conquer sheer rock faces, icy ridges, and dizzying heights with ropes, pitons, and skill.
 • Survival at Altitude – Balance hunger, thirst, warmth, and stamina as the mountain itself fights back.
 • Tools of Survival – Scavenge, craft, and master the gear that keeps you alive in extreme conditions.
 • Immersive Solo Journey – Face the mountain alone. No allies. No retries. Only your willpower stands between triumph and failure.
 • Ever-Changing Environments – From lush foothills to frozen summits, adapt to shifting weather and dangerous terrain.

Do you have the strength to conquer the peak—or will the mountain claim you forever?
